dict.acceptation: 顶端；小费；小建议，小窍门；轻拍；
给小费；倾斜，翻倒；装顶端；

sent.orig: The Tip Dropper~ A very practical gimmick for hiding, controlling and stealing the tip.
sent.trans: 一个非常实用的道具，用在隐藏、控制和偷取什么东西上的道具。

sent.orig: Stress analysis in variation states at crack tip and notch crown tip is presented.
sent.trans: 摘要分析了椭圆孔口端点和裂纹端点处的变动态应力。

sent.orig: Here is another tip: Don't touch the tip with the tips of your fingers.
sent.trans: 还有一条提示：别用手指尖摸小费。

sent.orig: For selection of a smaller tip, see Tip table Page 42.
sent.trans: 选择较小的喷嘴，参阅喷嘴表。

sent.orig: Methods: Two triangular random skin flaps mastoid area were pushed into auriculocephalic sulcus and sutured tip-to-tip.
sent.trans: 方法在颅耳沟处设计两个相对的三角形任意皮瓣，互相推进后交叉或对位缝合，加深颅耳沟，再造颅耳角。
